overview:
Kev’s Tagline: ‘Less Talk, More Code’

Born in an age of segregation marked by a stereotypical chasm between software development and graphic design, Kev builds bridges to create compelling user experiences through meaningful online interactions. Versed in the common underlying principles of Graphic Design, User Experience Design, User Interface Design, Web Application Design, Information Design, Interaction Design and Information Architecture with solid skills in Linux/Apache/MySQL/PHP, XML, XSL, HTML, CSS, and Javascript, Kev takes a heads-down Kaizen approach to rapid product development.
